doc:
Colin Sharp https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colin_Sharp 0 Colin Ainsley Sharp (5 September 1953 – 7 September 2009) was an English actor, biographer, percussionist and singer-songwriter, who was part of the Manchester music scene of the late 1970s and dedicated to arts in Newcastle upon Tyne. Colin_Ainsley_Sharp ( 5_September_1953 – 7_September_2009 ) was an_English_actor , biographer , percussionist_and_singer-songwriter , who was part of the_Manchester_music_scene of the_late_1970s and dedicated to arts in Newcastle upon Tyne .
